duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading a sales team to achieve revenue and growth targets by establishing sales goals and monitoring team members’ achievements
Coaching employees on improving skills and industry knowledge through face-to-face and digital channels
Driving sales objectives and working with key team members to develop market strategies and presentations
Providing accurate weekly, monthly and quarterly forecasts
Attracting and retaining account executives (hire, train, coach, appraise, reward, motivate, etc.)
Participating in the sales process on key accounts and maintaining positive customer relationships
Ensuring adoption and consistent use of key sales tech stack applications
